cofh.lib.capability

Interface IArcheryAmmoItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IArcheryItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArcheryAmmoItemWrapper, PotionQuiverItem.PotionQuiverItemWrapper

    public interface IArcheryAmmoItem
extends IArcheryItem
    Implement this interface as a capability for a Quiver item which should be compatible with CoFH's improved archery handling.

    • Method Detail

      • createArrowEntity

        net.minecraft.entity.projectile.AbstractArrowEntity createArrowEntity(net.minecraft.world.World world,
                                                                      net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity shooter)
        Handle creation of a custom arrow entity - this method actually spawns the arrow!
        Parameters:
        world - World where the arrow will spawn.
        shooter - Player holding the bow.
        Returns:
        Custom arrow entity which was spawned in the world.
